item.title: Fontainebleau Resorts: Luxury Living in Miami & Las Vegas
item.description: Experience luxury at Fontainebleau in Miami Beach and Las Vegas: exceptional stays with fine dining, spas, and entertainment.

item.title: Our Hotel's Story & Legacy - Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Since its creation, Fontainebleau has steadily built upon its legacy as a cultural icon. From the original resort in Miami Beach to its newest hotel on the famed Las Vegas Strip, America’s first luxury resort has a name synonymous with enduring character and captivating prestige.

item.title: Timeline - Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Explore the rich history of Fontainebleau Miami Beach with a guided History Walk. Discover the iconic moments and legacy behind this legendary Miami resort.

item.title: Fontainebleau Legacy: Iconic History in Miami & Las Vegas
item.description: Discover Fontainebleau's rich history: from iconic luxury in Miami and Las Vegas to a symbol of sophistication.

item.title: Cellar1954 Pairing Dinner Series | Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: These intimate dinners take place within Fontainebleau’s signature restaurants, each showcasing its own unique ambiance and culinary point of view, inviting guests to savor every nuanced detail.

item.title: Happy Hour at Mirabella - Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Join us for happy hour at the Mirabella Bar & Lounge, where you can indulge in classic cocktails and a specially curated selection of small plates.

item.title: Special Offers - Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Step into the seamless elegance of the Fontainebleau VIP experience. Enjoy private check-in, daily breakfast, priority dining, personalized concierge service, and a $150 resort credit. Plus, book a cabana and receive Champagne or Rosé on us.

item.title: Miami Beach Suite Package | Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Escape to Fontainebleau and experience the ultimate reset. Whether you’re coming from Alabama, the Carolinas, Florida, or Georgia, make Bleau your home away from home.

item.title: Miami Beach Restaurants - Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Fontainebleau Miami Beach, a luxury oceanfront resort, offers 12 fine dining & casual restaurants with innovative culinary concepts & impeccable service.

item.title: Transportation & Directions - Fontainebleau Miami Beach
item.description: Situated on oceanfront Collins Avenue in the heat of Millionaire’s Row, Fontainebleau is one of the most historically and architecturally significant Hotels on Miami Beach.
